snippet: Two children were killed in their sleep by a python that escaped from a pet shop, the Royal Canadian Mounted Police said Monday.
abstract: Two children are killed in their sleep by python that had escaped from pet shop in New Brunswick, Canada.
lead_paragraph: Two children were killed in their sleep by a python that escaped from a pet shop, the Royal Canadian Mounted Police said Monday.

headline.main: Canada: Escaped Snake Kills 2 Children, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Canada: Escaped Snake Kills 2 Children, Police Say
